game.name: Kungfu2
game.shortDescription: This is a fast-paced survivor game. Players will play as martial artists with special skills, and challenge 30 levels in a 30-second violent battle. Each character has its own characteristics, and with a variety of martial arts and props, activate the power of bondage and challenge the final BOSS!
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a fast-paced survivor game. Players will play as martial artists with special skills, and challenge 30 levels in a 30-second violent battle. Each character has its own characteristics, and with a variety of martial arts and props, activate the power of bondage and challenge the final BOSS!
